text: Patriots Basketball Club, also known as simply Patriots, is a basketball club based in Kigali, Rwanda. Established in 2014, it plays its home games at Amahoro Indoor Stadium. The team is a four-time champion of the Rwandan National Basketball League.Rwanda: Basketball - Patriots, Reg Clash in Pre- Season Final Richard Bishumba, AllAfrica.com. 25 November 2016, accessed 11 April 2017. ==History== On 21 September 2019, the Patriots won their fourth league title after defeating REG BBC in Game 7 of the finals, in a sold out Kigali Arena. On 26 October, head coach Henry Mwinuka, who won three league championships with Patriots, parted ways with the club to join REG. On 6 November, assistant coach Carey Odhiambo was promoted to become head coach. ==Personnel== ===Current roster=== ===Notable players=== * Aristide Mugabe * Walter Nkurunziza * Sedar Sagamba * Jean de Dieu Niagunduka ==Honours== *National Basketball League **Winners (4): 2016, 2017, 2018, 2019 ==Head coaches== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! style="" | Coach ! style="" | From ! style="" | To ! style="" | Honours |- |- | Henry Mwinuka || December 2016 || October 2019 || 4x NBL champion |- | Carey Odhiambo || November 2019 || February 2019 || |- | Dean Murray || February 2020 || now || |} ==References== ==External links== *Presentation at Afrobasket.com *Presentation at facebook Category:Basketball teams in Rwanda Category:Basketball teams established in 2014 Category:2014 establishments in Rwanda Category:Sport in Kigali Category:Basketball Africa League teams
title: Patriots BBC
